mapper.select: SELECT youtube.id,youtube_playlist_id,youtube.title as video_title, youtube.thumbnail_medium,youtube.view_count,search_count,like_count,favorite_count,chn.title as channel_title FROM tbl_recommended_video rvideo INNER JOIN tbl_youtube youtube INNER JOIN tbl_youtube_channel chn ON rvideo.youtube_id=youtube.id AND youtube.channel_id=chn.id

SELECT yt.id,yt.video_id,yt.channel_id,yt.youtube_playlist_id,yt.title,yt.description,yt.publish_date, yt.thumbnail_default,yt.thumbnail_high,yt.playlist_id,yt.view_count,yt.search_count,yt.like_count,yt.favorite_count,yt.comment_count, yt.comment_disabled,yt.duration,yt.score,yt.magnitude,yt.lilac_like_count,yt.lilac_dislike_count,yt.position FROM tbl_youtube yt INNER JOIN tbl_youtube_playlist pl ON yt.youtube_playlist_id=pl.id WHERE pl.id=#{playlistId} ORDER BY yt.position ASC

SELECT pl.id as lecture_video_id,pl.lecture_id,pl.lecture_member_id,yt.id,yt.video_id,yt.channel_id,yt.youtube_playlist_id,yt.title,yt.description,yt.publish_date, yt.thumbnail_default,yt.thumbnail_high,yt.playlist_id,yt.view_count,yt.search_count,yt.like_count,yt.favorite_count,yt.comment_count, yt.comment_disabled,yt.duration,yt.score,yt.magnitude, yt.lilac_like_count,yt.lilac_dislike_count, (SELECT title FROM tbl_lecture WHERE id=pl.lecture_id) as lecture_title FROM ref_tbl_lecture_youtube pl INNER JOIN tbl_youtube yt ON pl.youtube_id=yt.id WHERE pl.lecture_member_id=#{memberId} AND pl.youtube_playlist_id=#{youtubePlaylistId} AND pl.lecture_id=#{noteId} ORDER BY yt.position ASC
SELECT yt.duration FROM ref_tbl_lecture_youtube ref INNER JOIN tbl_youtube yt ON ref.youtube_id=yt.id WHERE ref.id=#{lectureVideoId}

SELECT pl.id,playlist_id,pl.channel_id,pl.title,pl.thumbnail_medium,item_count,chn.title as channel_title FROM tbl_youtube_playlist pl INNER JOIN tbl_youtube_channel chn ON pl.channel_id=chn.id WHERE MATCH(pl.title) AGAINST (#{keyword}) ORDER BY pl.publish_date LIMIT #{offset}, #{count}

SELECT tmp.id as youtube_playlist_id, tmp.title, tmp.thumbnail_medium, chn.title as channel_title FROM (SELECT pl.id, pl.channel_id, pl.title, pl.thumbnail_medium FROM tbl_recommended_playlist rpl INNER JOIN tbl_youtube_playlist pl ON rpl.youtube_playlist_id = pl.id) as tmp INNER JOIN tbl_youtube_channel chn ON tmp.channel_id = chn.id
mapper.update: UPDATE ref_tbl_lecture_youtube SET progress=#{playtime} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE tbl_youtube_like SET like_status=#{likeStatus} WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND youtube_id=#{videoId}
UPDATE tbl_youtube SET lilac_like_count=lilac_like_count+1 WHERE id=#{videoId}
UPDATE tbl_youtube SET lilac_dislike_count=lilac_dislike_count+1 WHERE id=#{videoId}
UPDATE tbl_youtube SET lilac_like_count=lilac_like_count-1 WHERE id=#{videoId}
UPDATE tbl_youtube SET lilac_dislike_count=lilac_dislike_count-1 WHERE id=#{videoId}
mapper.select: SELECT lilac_like_count, lilac_dislike_count FROM tbl_youtube WHERE id=#{videoId}
